ogTitle: how to kill the new coronavirus: part ii - smarther news
ogDescription: dr. michael lin, phd, md of lin labs, stanford university, joins smarther news for an update to discuss what we’ve learned, what we need to know, and what to watch for at this point in the covid-19 pandemic.
summary: Dr. Michael Lin, PhD, MD of Lin Labs, Stanford University, joins SmartHER News for an update to discuss what we’ve learned, what we need to know, and what to watch for at this point in the COVID-19 pandemic.
body:
